scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && node_modules/.bin/webpack --env development --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && node_modules/.bin/webpack --env production --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development node dist/pc-builds.app.js
scripts.start: npm run build:production && NODE_ENV=production node dist/pc-builds.app.js
